mapper.sql: id, date_created, last_updated, corp_id, suite_key, permanent_code
mapper.select:
SELECT FROM isv_corp_suite
WHERE corp_id = #{corpId} and suite_key = #{suiteKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO isv_corp_suite ( date_created, last_updated, corp_id, suite_key, permanent_code ) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{corpId}, #{suiteKey}, #{permanentCode} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE last_updated = now(), permanent_code = #{permanentCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM isv_corp_suite WHERE suite_key = #{suiteKey} AND corp_id = #{corpId}
